Card Effect: Roll the die. Jump as many floors as your dice roll's result.
Draw a card. You may discard it and draw a new card.
Jump 2 floors. Discard a card to jump 3 more.
Discard two Hip! cards: draw two cards, jump 4 floors. Otherwise, does nothing.
Roll the die, then jump 5 floors. If the die rolled a 1, lose the game.
Jump as many floors as the tower did on your last turn.
Jump 2 floors. If you're on a 3+ combo streak, also draw a card.
